duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, prepare, and implement instructional process for students with Individualized Education Plans (IEPs)
Establish a climate that promotes a firm, fair, and respectful classroom environment with a focus on social development and group responsibility
Record student progress, maintain student files, and prepare reports on students and activities
Provide direct subject-based instruction and/or work in a team environment to collaboratively and/or co-teach curricular subjects as required in IEP
Modify curriculum and assist with differentiated instruction for students and staff
Maintain the physical center, furniture, and supplies in a neat and orderly condition according to procedure
Respond constructively to formal and informal feedback. Perform other duties as assigned

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher in education or related field. Active special education certification.
